attributes.title: Team Gus vs. Team Buttz - #01
attributes.caption: Team Gus vs. Team Buttz
attributes.description: Catch this first episode of Rooster Teeth's official game show! A live half hour of fast-paced laughs as host Jon Risinger puts two RT teams on the spot for points and mayhem. Featuring Gus Sorola, Barbara Dunkelman, Miles Luna and Kerry Shawcross.

attributes.title: Team Buttz vs. Team CSC - #02
attributes.caption: Team Buttz vs. Team CSC
attributes.description: Ray and Ryan take on team #Buttz in episode 2 of On The Spot!

attributes.title: Team CSC vs. Team Free Willy - #03
attributes.caption: Team CSC vs. Team Free Willy
attributes.description: Ryan and Ray get into a smelly situation for On The Spot #3.
attributes.display_title: Team CSC vs. Team Free Willy - #03

attributes.title: Team CSC vs. Team R&R Connection - #04
attributes.caption: Team CSC vs. Team R&R Connection
attributes.description: In this week's episode of On The Spot, Team CSC and Team R&R Connection (formerly known as Team Gus) are back competing to see which team will make a comeback and which one will remain being a sad, sad loser.
attributes.display_title: Team CSC vs. Team R&R Connection - #04

attributes.title: Team Free Willy vs. Blumpkin Bros - #05
attributes.caption: Team Free Willy vs. Blumpkin Bros
attributes.description: Team Free Willy returns to defend their title against Blaine and Josh.

attributes.title: Team Free Willy vs. Team Meat Team - #06
attributes.caption: Team Free Willy vs. Team Meat Team
attributes.description: Will Chris and Aaron from Social Disorder end Team Free Willy's 3 week winning streak

attributes.title: Team Meat Team vs. Jack Is Fat - #07
attributes.caption: Team Meat Team vs. Jack Is Fat
attributes.description: Team Meat Team takes on new challengers Jack and Joel to defend their reigning championship.

attributes.title: Team Dissabled vs. Team Hotica - #08
attributes.description: Jon reunites The Wingmen for this special holiday episode of On The Spot #08!
